tool_description: Tictail is an easy and free online shop solution that not only helps you create a beautiful online store within minutes, but also helps you run it successfully.
name: Tictail Online Store
title: Tictail Online Store

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/orders/<order_id>
api_list.description: Retrieve an order for this store (store_id)

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/products/<product_id>
api_list.description: Retrieve an product (product_id) in this store (store_id)

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/customers/<customer_id>
api_list.description: Get a single customer (customer_id) of this store (store_id)

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/orders
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of orders for this store (store_id), sorted by created_at

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Only get orders after this id

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Only get orders before this id

optional_parameters.name: modified_after
optional_parameters.description: Only get orders that have been modified after this date, useful for keeping data in sync

optional_parameters.name: modified_before
optional_parameters.description: Only get orders that have been modified before this date

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>
GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/products
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of products in this store (store_id).

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Only get products after this product_id. Defaults to the first product.

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Only get products before this product_id

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/theme
GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/followers
api_list.description: Get a list of followers of this store (store_id)

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Only get followers after this follower_id Defaults to the first follower

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Only get followers before this follower_id

api_list.name: GET /v1/me
api_list.description: Check which store the provided access token has access to
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://community-tictail-online-store.p.rapidapi.com/v1/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-tictail-online-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://community-tictail-online-store.p.rapidapi.com/v1/me"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "community-tictail-online-store.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: GET /v1/stores/<store_id>/customers
api_list.description: Get a list of all customers in this store (store_id)

optional_parameters.name: after
optional_parameters.description: Only get customers after this id Defaults to the first customer.

optional_parameters.name: before
optional_parameters.description: Only get customers before this id
